alert.note: Alert for Northern Washoe County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 24 at 2:34PM PST until December 25 at 11:00PM PST by NWS Reno
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 PM PST SATURDAY... * CHANGES...Adjusted snowfall totals. * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. Except 4 to 8 inches above 5000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Surprise Valley California and Northern Washoe County. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 11 PM PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Very strong winds could cause tree damage and low visibility in blowing snow.
info.instruction: Avoid travel if possible, you could be stuck in your vehicle for many hours. If you must travel, prepare for long delays and carry an emergency kit with extra food, water and clothing. If you stay home, have a backup plan in case of power outages. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
